column5: Hit up a few eastern tribs today.  The bite was slow but most deep pools had 1 or 2 fish.  Lost a ~15" brown on the river bank while waiting for a camera man but the last steelie made up for it.  All fish were caught on brown roe and swam away to be caught again.           Check out the nice colourations on this hen    Grabbed a new Sage VT2 9'5 8 wt for a great deal and 3880 reel, next report will be on the fly!  Cheers
Amazing what you can pull out of a culvert!! lol  Nice shootin..
Nice man!  Well done.  Got out for an hour and a bit tonight and lost a nice fish....nice to get the sprind started for me!!
Nice man!  Looks like gin clear conditions.
That last shot is fantastic. Nice fish man!
Nice shootin!! Glad you kept the camera guy closer this time..lol..
